item.title: Deciphering Heptopod Grammar
item.description: You’re standing in front of a military tent outside an Alien ship. The military just helicoptered you in from your office at the Linguistics department at MIT. You’re getting ready to start working on dicephering an Alien language. You have a team of 50 military cryptographers at your service. What’s written on the whiteboard.
